gstFiling.description: Need assistance with quarterly GST filing for Q4 FY2025-26. Approximately 100 transactions to be filed.

incomeTax.description: Individual income tax return filing required for assessment year 2025-26.

audit.description: Annual statutory audit required for private limited company with revenue of Rs. 10 Crores.

messages.clientToCA: Hello, I have some questions about the service request. When can you start working on this?
messages.caToClient: Thank you for your request. I've reviewed the details and can start working on it immediately.
messages.urgentFollowUp: This is urgent. Please provide an update on the progress.
messages.completionNotice: I've completed the work. Please review the deliverables and confirm.

excellent.comment: Excellent service! Very professional and completed well before the deadline. Highly recommended.

good.comment: Good work overall. Communication could be improved but the quality of work was satisfactory.

average.comment: Average service. Work was completed but there were some delays.
